meanings.definition: A drug used to alleviate symptoms of depression.
meanings.sent1: She takes an antidepressant every morning to help with her sadness.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an antidepressant to improve his mood.
meanings.sent3: The antidepressant worked like a charm, turning her frown upside down.
meanings.sent4: His smile became as bright as the sun after starting the antidepressant.
meanings.sent5: The antidepressant was a ray of hope in her dark days.

meanings.definition: Relating to or acting as an antidepressant.
meanings.sent1: The antidepressant effect of the medication was evident in her improved mood.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the antidepressant properties of the herbal tea she drank.
meanings.sent3: His positive attitude was like an antidepressant, spreading joy to everyone around him.
meanings.sent4: The music had an antidepressant impact on her, lifting her spirits instantly.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children had an antidepressant quality, making her heart feel light.
